answers.answer: I haven't had it personally, but I know the classic signs are high blood pressure, headache, and swelling in your feet, hands, etc. Its so important to catch it early, so I would at least call and talk to a nurse since you have two of those symptoms.

I had it at 37 weeks with my 1st and 36.6 weeks with my second I got emergency c sections with both of them  cause of it I was extremely swollen my bp kept going higher and I was dizzy.. i would say go to l&d and. Tell them urs symptoms cause it can cause you to have a seizure :-( if your pressure gets to high good luck mommy

Pre-eclampsia is a tricky little bugger! If you feel like are heading down that path go in.....Symptoms: (basic)High blood pressureswelling of hands, feet, and (possible) around your eyesprotein (excessive) in your urineI showed no symptoms and bam I had it! They actually only discovered it when we had a 24 hour urine done....i was 38 weeks.....took a few days to get it back but my doctor induced me at 39 weeks to be safe!Please don't wait if this is what you think it is.....

I'm at major risk for it due to family history but the symptoms for me will be hard to notice. My blood pressure is naturally pretty low so when it gets high for me that's usually normal range for most people. I already have swelling in my hands and feet but I also work a lot so that's out. I have constant migraines that I have to take meds for... that's out too. I'm told they can catch it if the protein levels in your pee is really high though. That's why they **** test you at each appointment. If you're worried you should really call your doc.
You might call your Dr first and ask to be checked before going to labor and delivery.
Dr did say go in to get checked and bumped my next apt for next Friday to Monday. I am heading in after an apt at 130.
I had it with my first pregnancy 8 years ago. I was just real swollen and I had to have a c section about 32 weeks. Im pregnant wit my second now and im praying to God I dont get it this time

Ihad sever preeclampsia with my first and for 5 weeks I was out in bed rest from swelling then one day I was feeling really weird thought I was really hungry and kind if had a heart burn feeling than I stated throwing up that night. called the doc the next morning went to the hospital they said I wasnt in bad shape yet but by the next morning my kidneys and liver had started going into failure. you should definitely call your doc it happens so fast and is so dangerous.

Headache that won't go away with Tylenol, swelling, pain above your ribs, high bp, and just a dreadful feeling like something is not right or wrong or something bad is gonna happen are the symptoms I had!! I delivered my first at 34 weeks and had a terrible time!! My second was delivered at 31 weeks all because of preeclampsia!! I would go to labor and delivery!! It can be very dangerous and it sounds like u need to be tested!! Good luck!! Please update!!!

question: What are the symptoms you had if you had pre e? What was your bp at? How far along were you on your pregnancy when it developed?I'm 32.3 weeks and the past 2 days have been feeling just off I guess. Today I checked my bp and it was 140/90. My norm is 120/80. I'm kinda dizzy and have been having migraine the past couple days with a weirdly increased appetite. Like to the point I can't stop eating. The eating prob isn't relevant but I'd like to get some opinions before making a decision to go to l & d.
title: Preeclampsia
